trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The veteran hunter is sick of waiting around.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_TODO_00<tab>Search for the trainee hunter.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_TODO_01<tab>/cheer on the trainee hunter.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_TODO_02<tab>/cheer on the trainee hunter once more.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_TODO_03<tab>/psych up the trainee hunter.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the veteran hunter.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSA05152_000_000<tab>Rough place for a stroll, ain't it? I'm impressed ye made it out this far. If only my trainee had the same grit!
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSA05152_000_001<tab>The plan was to go on a hunt together, but I haven't seen hide nor hair of her all day. I reckon the lightnin's got her scared stiff.

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSA05152_000_002<tab>We're supposed to meet here, so I'd rather not step away if I can help it. Could ye swing through the outskirts and look for a fresh-faced hunter quakin' in her boots?
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSA05152_000_003<tab>Me intuition tells me that fresh-faced hunter is still in the outskirts, draggin' her heels.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_004<tab>Um... Can I help you?

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_005<tab>My mentor asked you to come find me!? Oh no... Well, I'm not proud to admit this, but that lightning is making me weak in the knees, and not in a good way.

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_006<tab>This is rather embarrassing having only just met, but...it always helped to settle my nerves when the other hunters would <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me on. Might I ask you to do the same?
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_007<tab>Even the smallest <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> would go a long way to help settle my nerves.

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>The trainee hunter seems intimidated by the lightning. Perhaps you could <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> her on, that she might find the courage to carry out her duties.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_009<tab>Thanks... That helps a little. I think I'm feeling brave enough to finally set foot out there.

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_010<tab>But, um... If you should notice me starting to lose my nerve, I hope you'll be there. To <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me on again.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_011<tab>Aaaaaahhh! Nope! I can't do it! I-I just can't!

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>The trainee hunter is rapidly losing heart. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> her on, that she may return to the fray.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_013<tab>Ugh... Thanks. Look, can I ask you something? How are you not terrified of the pylons?

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_014<tab>I know they function as relay points for the energy gathered out here, but they quite literally <var 1A 02 /var>attract<var 1A 01 /var> lightning! Every strike is like an explosion, rattling me to the bone─I hate it!

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_015<tab>Still, it's not much safer standing around here, so I may as well keep going... If I stop again, I need you to really <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me up, okay!?
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_016<tab><sob> I can't take this anymore! I want to go home!
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>The trainee hunter is paralyzed with fear. Is there aught you can do to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> her up?
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_018<tab>Nnngh... I know it may not seem like it, but your moral support is a tremendous help right now, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.

TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_019<tab>I'm so close to the rendezvous point, but the roar of the lightning really isn't helping my nerves... Maybe I'll pretend it's an asterodia! Yes, just a big, bloodthirsty asterodia...
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSB05152_000_020<tab>I had to dodge some lightning bolts, but I made it! Thank you for giving me the push I needed!
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSA05152_000_021<tab>My trainee here told me the whole story. Ye lit a proper fire in her belly, eh?
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSA05152_000_022<tab>To her credit, she did well on the hunters' exam, and I reckon she's got promise. Not like she's the only one who's nervous about the lightnin', anyhow.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSA05152_000_023<tab>'Sides, yer words of encouragement seem to have struck a chord with her, so I have faith she'll overcome it in time.
TEXT_KINGZF004_05152_HUNTERSA05152_000_024<tab>Now, if ye'll excuse us, we've got some monsters to hunt! Take care!
